attributes.action: Make UK National Doctors Day on April 9th
attributes.additional_details: Our NHS Doctors need the recognition they deserve considering the circumstances of the Pandemic we are all currently experiencing. Each and every Doctor should be applauded every single day, let  alone year. Our lives are placed into their hands every day and they do their best to save each and every one of us. Our NHS would not be running right now, this year, 2020, without them.
attributes.background: We would like the government to declare the date May 7th as National Doctors Day.

rejection.details:
Designate a day for the recognition of our NHS and all Emergency Services.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/308614

You may also like to sign this petition:
Create a new Bank Holiday in recognition of the NHS and all its amazing workers
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303882

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
